title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, embed, list models via Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration letting you plug any Ollama model into chains, agents, retrieval pipelines and more.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, playground, RAG, multi-user) installable via Docker in one command.

title: continue
summary: Open-source VS Code & JetBrains coding assistant that connects to Ollama for local code completion, inline chat and retrieval.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight proxy that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-compatible server for use in VS Code.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, embeddings and custom options; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and LangChain.

title: chatd
summary: Tiny cross-platform desktop app that exposes Ollama as a local ChatGPT clone with markdown, history and themes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; supports slash commands and thread context.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code generation, refactoring and chat via Ollama with Telescope picker integration.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama featuring persistent chat sessions, markdown rendering and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC and ingress.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook containing 30+ short recipes for using Ollama with Python, JS, Go, Docker, RAG, function-calling, etc.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module demonstrating how to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama REST API; published on crates.io.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community extension enabling Camunda 8 workers to call Ollama models for human-task summarisation or DMN decisions.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama: generate, chat, pull models with idiomatic Go types and streaming support.
